result.execSummary:
The defendant Robin Paul Bildeau was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 3rd Degree Sexual Assault, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $105.00 costs   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Apply any prison wages to costs

2 years initial confinement followed by 3 years on extended supervsion credit for 148 days, costs and DNA Sample and Surcharge $375.00.  No contact with victim S Isham,  DOC will require sex offender registry and will have other conditions. DEF is NOT eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program and   DEF is NOT eligible for Substance Abuse Program.
Concurrent with: 11cf44

judgments.dispoDesc: State moves to amend to 3rd Degree sexual assualt (FG)  940.225(3) court grants, amended information filed,   DEF pleads NC found guilty,  Court imposes 5 years Prison concurrent with Sawyer Case 11CF44  2 years initial confinement followed by 3 years on extended supervsion credit for 148 days, costs and DNA Sample and Surcharge $375.00.  No contact with victim S Isham,  DOC will require sex offender registry and will have other conditions.

Defendant Robin Paul Bildeau in court with attorney Stephen Donald Willett.  Defendant Robin Paul Bildeau in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts  State moves to amend to 3rd Degree sexual assualt (FG)  940.225(3) court grants, amended information filed,   DEF pleads NC found guilty,  Court imposes 5 years Prison concurrent with Sawyer Case 11CF44  2 years initial confinement followed by 3 years on extended supervsion credit for 148 days, costs and DNA Sample and Surcharge $375.00.  No contact with victim S Isham,  DOC will require sex offender registry and will have other conditions. DEF is NOT eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program and   DEF is NOT eligible for Substance Abuse Program.

Defendant Robin Paul Bildeau in court, in custody via video.  Atty Aaron Marcoux  appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court makes stmt.  Defendant states he has received copies of the criminal complaint(s).    Court recites charges.  Defendant would like to speak to an attorney.  Court will set court date.  State requests defendant be held w/o bail upon the alligations.  Court advised the defendant as to his right to a preliminary exam w/i 10 days as he is in custody or he can waive the time limits to allow him to retain an attorney.  Defendant wishes to waive his time limits for preliminary exam.  Court finds defendant waived time limits.
Served on 11-3-15.
